oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Negro League All-Star Team
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Peforming Identity
Athletes
African American baseball players; Negro leagues
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Newspaper image of uniformed African American baseball team.

Pitcher Bob Griffith, who was from Wilson County, is pictured second from left. To his immediate right is pitcher Satchel Paige. This all-star team won the Denver Post Baseball Tournament championship in 1936.
